title: Ukranian Village/ 2 bed/1 bath/in unit W/D/ AC/ DW/ Yard/ pets ok/ 9/1
posting_body: To schedule a viewing, please call or text Lourdes at 773-370-1989 - leave a VM with name, phone # and address.

Ukranian Village / 2336 W. Iowa, 1F /  2 Bed/1Bath / Available Sept. 1st / $2,100/Month / $2,100 Security Deposit / Gas Forced Heating & Central A/C / Tenant responsible for  cooking gas, heat & Electric /
In Unit Laundry / Yard /  Pets OK with $300 Fee - 2 pets max (Dogs under 45lb) / Street Parking.
Minimum 1-Year Lease / $50 Credit/background check / 650+ credit score, no Evictions.
Gut rehabbed in 2020 - 2 bed/1 bath adjacent to West Town.
Hardwood floors, separate dining room, Stainless steel appliances (stove, fridge microwave and dishwasher).
Dimensions:
Living room: 12 x 15
Dining room: 12 x 11
Kitchen: 11 x 14
1st bedroom: 08 x 12
2nd bedroom: 08 x 11
Laundry room: 04 x 10
Nearby Favorites: The Empty Bottle/ Ez Inn/ Bite Cafe/ Joey's G Mac n Cheese/ Boeufhaus / Dark Matter Coffee / A Tavola/ Salsa Picante / The Beetle Bar & Grill / Smith Park and more.
Grocery Stores:
Rich's Deli / Jewel / Osco / Mariano's
Transportation: Western Ave bus/ Chicago Ave bus/ Grand Ave bus/ Western & Hubbard Metra
To apply, visit <URL>.
Please have ready before you start an electronic copy 2 recent pay stubs and Photo ID for a total of 3 electronic files.
